addHeaderResources

public abstract void addHeaderResources(javax.portlet.PortletRequest request,
                                        javax.portlet.PortletResponse response,
                                        java.lang.String elements)
インタフェース HeaderResource の記述:
Add specified tag elements to portal server.

定義:

パラメータ:
request - portlet's request
response - portlet's response
elements - tags provided by MyFaces's AddResource
